Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockPlayer
public class Player extends Object
Player Class is called by Game Class. Contains the Player username, score, hiddenObjective, resources, hand and board. fpr *

      public Player(String username, Game currentGame)
      Constructor of Player
      set up a new Player and sets all Resources to zero.
      Parameters:
      username - it is the unique identifier of the player.
      currentGame - pointer to the instance of game the player is playing.

      • GameConsts

    • playCard

      public void playCard(ColoredCard playedCard, Coordinates coordinates) throws RequirementsError
      Plays a card on the game board at the specified coordinates. If the played card is a GoldCard, and it meets the player's requirements, it is placed on the board and the player's score is updated. If the played card is a StdCard, it is placed on the board and if it is a point card, the player's score is updated. Finally, the played card is removed from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card to be played.
      coordinates - The coordinates where the card should be placed on the board.
      Throws:
      RequirementsError
